text: 15.14: Ais 9.16; Mal 2.8; Mt 23.16; Ru 6.39; Ro 2.19Nde Fherasiŋ ndɨkndɨgɨ thari. Mbe rɨmgi mbatɨgi gumgi fara muuŋgi. Mbe rɨmgi mbatɨga, fhura tuavar harigi gumgi khɨvɨr za mbui. Maaŋ muuŋgip, rɨmani mbatɨgi guma the, ana tuavar harigi rɨmani mbatɨgi guma khɨvɨv, mani ŋgɨrga, mani vhɨra wani tɨgɨra mbok thɨgɨrga.”
